Articles.Content:
Hey y'all,

I normally install mods through CKAN, but since 2 days, I can't install Kerbalism with the application .

It won't let me 'Apply Changes', so I can't install it properly. 

Is anyone else having the same problem ? (all other mods are installing correctly)

Proof : 

Spoiler

 P.S. : If it's not in the right sub, please tell me where I should post it cause I really need this mod to work

This question needs to go to whoever set up the Kerbalism CKAN metadata. Unfortunately, being an open library, this could be anyone - Either ShotgunNinja himself, or an avid fan of his work, or even an automated script pulling newly uploaded mods from SpaceDock. Technically you could browse the Github repository and look for the contributor names, but there's no guarantee people will use the same handle on Github as they do here on the forums.

So your best bet is probabl trying the Kerbalism mod thread here on the forums, for starters. Maybe someone else there even has a similar issue.
